group_1.textRight: We should have a 'Thank You' party here?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, so we can show our gratitude @to everyone.
That way, we can return joy to others...@and maybe help this place out, too.
I see! You're more than welcome to do so!
Still, it depends on how many people @you plan to invite.
And you'll need some money for it all, too, right?

group_1.textRight: Oh...yes, that's right...!

group_1.textLeft: But it's for publicity, and it's a good story for us.
If you can help us procure ingredients,
and assist with serving the food...
I'll still need to confirm with my father,
But I think we just might be able @to work something out.

group_1.textRight: Ingredients... Hmm...

group_1.textLeft: Go ahead and answer.

group_1.textRight: Ah, excuse me...
Hello, Iroha?
I sent you a package some time ago. @Have you received it?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I'm not at the Villa right now... @What's in the box?

group_1.textRight: I was a guest at Mikazuki Villa, if you recall.
As thanks for you hosting me, I sent you some @vegetables and fish. Kirimine Town's specialty!
It's quite a lot of food, so feel free to have @a feast with your neighbors!

group_1.textLeft: Wow, that's... [chara:100101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100101:cheek_0][chara:100101:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:100101:lipSynch_1]Thank you so much!
Oh yes, while you're on the line...!

group_1.narration: I asked Shizuka about the party @we were trying to make happen, @and if it would be okay for us @to use the food she sent for it.

group_1.textRight: That's perfectly all right! I love parties!
Besides, I want people from everywhere beyond @our village to sample our food!
Actually, I'll go ask Mother if we can send more!

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry to be taking advantage of your @generous gift like this...

group_1.textRight: Don't worry about it. As they say... "Prosperity @gives us friends, and adversity proves them."

group_1.textLeft: I don't mean to intrude...but I heard @something about food...?

group_1.textRight: Yes, a friend of mine is sending us a lot of food!

group_1.textLeft: That's very encouraging!
I'll go speak with my father right away.
Please pardon me for a little while!
He's thrilled for the chance at publicity!

group_1.textRight: Great...! Thank you very much!

group_1.textLeft: I haven't seen my father smile like that in ages!

group_1.textRight: What's wrong?

group_1.textLeft: Shizuka said she's spoken with Nayuta @and Yuna.
It looks they'll all be helping us @with the ingredients!
I'm eager to see how many dishes we can make!

group_1.textRight: I started this with the hope I could help @everyone else...
But I ended up being the one who @was helped again.

group_1.textLeft: Well, that just goes to show you HAVE been @helping people.
The karma for all the virtuous things @you've done is paying off, you see?
I mean, you were a big help to me.
You kept me from accosting @an innocent person.
So I'm going to return the favor―
I'm gonna help you prepare for the party!
I'm sure there's a lotta people you've @really helped out.
Not just me.
It's just like the old saying: @What goes around, comes around.

group_1.textRight: Yes... You've had so many good encounters @in Kamihama, Iroha.
Isn't this the culmination of all that?

group_1.textLeft: I hope so...

group_1.narration: Karma... Other people have given me happiness, @so I want to give happiness in turn... @I could see clearly with that sort of logic.
I think the key to everyone's happiness is @that when someone else makes us happy, @we should pass that happiness on to others.
